channel.title: [help] how do i run the server
channel.description: Okay, before you get the idea that im a noob or anything. ive done everything to bring it up. no-ip utorrent compiling and it still wont come up. Im new to 508's and seemingly they just dont like me.. Please help with suggestions

item.title: [help] how do i run the server
item.dc:creator: @Djzmoney1 Djzmoney1
item.description:
@Djzmoney1 wrote:

oh my god… it worked![br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 23, 2009, 07:18:30 am[/size][hr]but now theres the matter of: None of my 508 clients are connecting to it

item.title: [help] how do i run the server
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“Djzmoney1, post:5, topic:321422”]quote author=xxlukexx link=topic=417876.msg3071680#msg3071680 date=1261572967]

I know i went back to those a second ago and it does the same thing “server already in use”

With utorrent, i heard you need to do it in a order to be able to login, its either:
no-ip, utorrent then run
no-ip, run the server then utorrent.[/quote]so bring up no-ip click the smiley run the server and then bring up utorrent?[
[/quote]

keep the smiley face ticked, then you can close that alltogether. Just make sure you have it down at the bottom on the little thing on the right, bring up utorrent then run server, or try the other way.

after it works, you can close utorrent aswell.

Read full topic
